title: Kahlua Mocha Milkshakes
directions: Place the chocolate liquor, Kahlua, and Mocha Iced Coffee into a blender. Add 4 scoops of ice cream and pulse until smooth. If you'd like a thicker milkshake, add the additional two scoops of ice cream.
Drizzle chocolate sauce in glasses, then pour milkshake in. Top with whipped cream, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cup Mocha International Delight Iced Coffee
Whipped cream for serving, if desired
